SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationId)) as LocationId,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) as Len_Borogh,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) as Zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]





SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]




SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases



-- Specify Collation, Warning will disappear
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )
    AS [result]



-- Apply collation Database Level
-- Only can alter your database no the master.


CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]



-- Reading file with no header

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    -- Column order is Matter.
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]


-- EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE
-- You should create it under your database, you cannot create in master database.
/*
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE <data_source_name> 
WITH (
    LOCATION = <'abfss://<container-name>@<storage-account-name>.dfs.core.windows.net/'

)

*/

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/'
)



SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    -- Column order is Matter.
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]



CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/'
)



SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    -- Column order is Matter.
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )
    AS [result]



SELECT name, location
FROM sys.external_data_sources
